condition.ptxt: No cool air comes out (A/C system does not operate)

action.ptxt: Perform recovery, evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant:J24B and N32A Model .
Check related fuses, and then check for short circuit to ground.
Check evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check A/C refrigerant pressure sensor referring to A/C Refrigerant Pressure Sensor and Its Circuit Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Repair as necessary.
Check ECT sensor referring to ECT (Engine Coolant Temperature) Sensor Inspection:J24B or Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:N32A .
Check ECM referring to A/C System Inspection at ECM:J24B and N32A Model .
Check HVAC control module referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Check magnet clutch referring to Magnet Clutch Operating Check:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Accessory (A/C compressor) drive belt loosened or broken

action.ptxt: Replace drive belt and/or belt tensioner as necessary.
Check compressor.
Check compressor relay referring to A/C Compressor Relay Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Temperature selector, blower speed selector, and/or air flow selector faulty

action.ptxt: Check HVAC control module referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Check BCM referring to Inspection of BCM and Its Circuits .

condition.ptxt: No cool air comes out (radiator cooling fan motor does not operate)

action.ptxt: Check related fuses, and then check for short circuit to ground.
Repair as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Radiator cooling fan motor relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check radiator cooling fan motor relay referring to Radiator Cooling Fan Relay Inspection:N32A or Radiator Cooling Fan Relay Inspection:J24B .
Check radiator cooling fan motor referring to Radiator Cooling Fan Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B or Radiator Cooling Fan Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:N32A .
Check ECM referring to A/C System Inspection at ECM:J24B and N32A Model .
Check HVAC control module referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .

condition.ptxt: No cool air comes out (blower motor does not operate)

action.ptxt: Check related fuses, and then check for short circuit to ground.
Check blower motor controller referring to Blower Motor Controller Inspection .
Check blower speed selector referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Check HVAC control module referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Repair as necessary.
Check blower motor referring to Blower Motor Inspection .
Check blower motor relay referring to Blower Motor Relay Inspection .

condition.ptxt: Cool air does not come out or insufficient cooling (A/C system normal operation)

ps.ptxt: Insufficient or excessive charge of refrigerant

action.ptxt: Check the amount of refrigerant and system for leaks.
Check condenser referring to A/C Condenser Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check A/C evaporator and evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Inspection:J24B and N32A Model and A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check expansion valve referring to Expansion Valve On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check desiccant.

ps.ptxt: Accessory (A/C compressor) drive belt loosened or broken

action.ptxt: Replace drive belt and/or belt tensioner as necessary.
Check magnet clutch referring to Magnet Clutch Operating Check:J24B and N32A Model .
Check compressor.
Replace desiccant, and then perform evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Air leaking from HVAC unit or air duct

action.ptxt: Repair as necessary.
Check HVAC unit.
Check temperature selector referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Check HVAC control module referring to Inspection of HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits:J24B and N32A Model .
Check temperature control actuator referring to Temperature Control Actuator Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check blower motor referring to Blower Motor Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Excessive compressor oil in A/C system

action.ptxt: Drain excessive compressor oil from A/C system circuit and compressor.

condition.ptxt: Cool air does not come out only intermittently

action.ptxt: Repair as necessary.
Check expansion valve referring to Expansion Valve On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Replace desiccant, and then perform evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant:J24B and N32A Model .
Check magnet clutch referring to Magnet Clutch Operating Check:J24B and N32A Model .
Check the amount of refrigerant.

condition.ptxt: Cool air comes out only at high speed

action.ptxt: Check condenser referring to A/C Condenser Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check the amount of refrigerant and system for leaks.
Replace desiccant, and then perform evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Accessory (A/C compressor) drive belt loosened or broken

action.ptxt: Replace drive belt and/or belt tensioner as necessary.
Check compressor.

condition.ptxt: Cool air does not come out only at high speed

action.ptxt: Check the amount of refrigerant.
Check A/C evaporator and evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Inspection:J24B and N32A Model and A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .

condition.ptxt: Insufficient air flow of cooled air

action.ptxt: Check A/C evaporator and evaporator temperature sensor referring to A/C Evaporator Inspection:J24B and N32A Model and A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Air leaking from HVAC unit or air duct

action.ptxt: Repair as necessary.
Check blower motor referring to Blower Motor Inspection .
Repair as necessary.
